segmentosSRT.text:
I never had to beg
when I ran the puppet troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: Big ambition for a little kid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: So gobble away. Help yourself to sauces.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, I'll help you stir that up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_24
